name: Circles Cycles
description:
Circles Cycles
Rotate the circles to reassemble a text or a logo. Made for a short school project, this game is based on simple mechanics and a sooth ambiance.

This first version contains 5 levels with various game logos or items, and displays the outer circle as a hint for level completion.

Controls

Left-click or touch on the left half of a circle to rotate it counter-clockwise.
Left-click or touch on the right half of a circle to rotate it clockwise.

Credits

Music: Acoustic Meditation 2 - Jason Shaw (https://audionautix.com/)
Win SFX: Picked Coin Echo - NenadSimic
Images (V1): Assassin's Creed (Ubisoft) ; Guild Wars 2 Heart of Thorns (ArenaNet) ; TES V Skyrim (Bethesda)
